ProductInfo.Features:
Accessories - AC Power Adapter, USB Cable, Carrying PouchFeatures
Google Android OS 4.0.3 and flash 11 - The NextBook is preloaded with the Google's powerful Linux-based Android operating system 4.0.3 designed specifically for tablets. Now, NextBook NEXT10P12 supports Adobe flash 11. You can play, listen and surf and never miss a beat!
WiFi & SD card compatible, and OTA - Your NEXT10P12 comes with built-in WiFi 802.11 b/g/n, you can surf the World Wide Web faster than ever. Your new NEXT10P12 is also equipped with 8GB internal memory that can support up to 32GB via the expansion slot. With new OTA capability, you will be automatically prompted when new updates are available. Specifications
Operating System - Google Android
OS Version - Icecream Sandwich 4.0
ProductInfo.Name: NextBook Premium Series Next10P12
